desc: Developed for the Federación Nacional de Cafeteros (Colombian Coffee Growers Federation) , it's a CD-ROM multimedia course for colombian coffee growers without any computer experience. The course, for use in a classroom as supplementary educational resource, give students a full set of excercises, video instructions and basic concepts to improve their digital literacy. Also, the course start a path to access virtual courses in SENA's Blackboard.
rol: Flash developer, ActionScript2 programmer, interaction designer.
req: Adobe Flash Player,a display wider than 800px
